review: Really, more like 3.5, but I'll give it the benefit of the doubt.  I got this for Christmas and I'm already quite enjoying it.  The one thing to be aware of is that currently many of the cable channels don't have apps for Fire TV like Starz and FXX.  Luckily I have a Kindle Fire that allows me to mirror to the TV from my Kindle.  So this has not been a major issue for me, but may be for other people who do not.  The other thing people should be aware of is that realistically you need an amazon prime account to have a really good experience with it.  One huge improvement might be to allow you to watch live tv through it, which I Have not found that I have been able to do.
